articles.author: Saumya Nigam
articles.title: NASA's Crew 7 aims returning to Earth on March 12: Details - India TV News
articles.description: During their six months on the ISS, the Crew-7 conducted science experiments and technology demonstrations to benefit people on Earth and prepare humans for future space missions.
articles.content:
NASAs 7 astronauts crew which is onboard the International Space Station (ISS) are preparing to return to Earth, after a 6-month stay in the orbiting lab, the US space agency has said.

articles.title: Bus-Size Asteroid Flew Closer Than The Moon - Watch The Orbit Animation - video Dailymotion - Dailymotion
articles.description: Asteroid 2024 DW flew about 139,000 miles (224,000 km) away from Earth. The space rock was estimated to be about 43 feet wide (13 m).   Credit: Space.com | animation: NASA/JPL-Caltech | edited by Steve Spaleta Music: Black Bullet by Deskant / courtesy of Epid…
